name: Cursed to Crawl - Web version
description:
Cursed to Crawl is originally made for mobile (And it should be available on Google Play Store). Hence why something are worded as they are. Also no idea if the save-feature works with Itch.io so I guess we will see.

Check it out: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.IP.cursedtocrawl.unity&pli=1

But since I like the game I decided to add it also to Itch.io. 

Originally made in 2019 with Jypeli, but since I was bored (plus wanted to make it better), I remade it in Unity. That's right, this is a remaster.

And while I'm at it, btw, there is more than just skeletons here.
